_comment: This is a template for adding new restaurants to the pizza editor
_instructions: 1. Copy this file and rename it to your restaurant's ID (e.g., 'yourrestaurant.json')
3. Build ingredient categories based ONLY on ingredients actually used in pizzas
4. Add all pizzas with their exact ingredients
5. Run validation to ensure all ingredients are used and no duplicates exist
6. Add the restaurant entry to restaurants.json
_validation_tips: Every ingredient defined MUST be used in at least one pizza
Every ingredient used in pizzas MUST be defined in categories
No duplicate ingredient IDs across all categories
Ingredient IDs should be lowercase, hyphenated (e.g., 'scharfe-salami')
Use specific ingredients (e.g., 'kirschtomaten') not generic ones (e.g., 'tomaten') if that's what the menu shows
Avoid template contamination - don't copy ingredients from other restaurants unless they're actually on this menu
